<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/portal/path"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the full absolute path to the current portal.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails

>

>
  
</RequestSchema>
